alert.note: Alert for Isabella; Montcalm (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 24 at 3:22PM EDT until April 24 at 4:15PM EDT by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: The National Weather Service in Grand Rapids has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Isabella County in central Michigan... Northeastern Montcalm County in central Michigan... * Until 415 PM EDT. * At 321 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Edmore, or 7 miles north of Stanton, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Mount Pleasant and Shepherd around 345 PM EDT. Rosebush around 355 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include McBride, Westville, Cedar Lake, Six Lakes, Loomis, Vestaburg, Blanchard, Wyman, Delwin and Winn. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
